extensionName.description: Name of the extension. Personally I suggest to keep it in English for easier search on AMO.

extensionDescription.message: Allows to rotate and zoom images directly on any website from context menu.

enableTransformationAnimation.description: Checkbox in options to enable animations.

rotateImage.description: Parent context menu entry for image rotation.

rotateImageBy.description: Context menu entry for rotating the image by given number of degrees with no direction specified.

rotateImageLeftBy.description: Context menu entry for rotating the image by given number of degrees to the left.

rotateImageRightBy.description: Context menu entry for rotating the image by given number of degrees to the right.

zoomImage.description: Parent context menu entry for image zooming.

downscaleImageTo.description: Context menu entry for un-zooming the image to given scale less than 100%.

zoomImageTo.description: Context menu entry for zooming the image to given scale more than 100%.

flipImage.description: Parent context menu entry for image flipping.

flipImageHorizontally.description: Context menu for flipping the image horizontally (left to right).

flipImageVertically.description: Context menu for flipping the image vertically (upside down).

resetImageTransformation.description: Context menu entry to reset either the image rotation or zoom.

resetAllImageTransformations.description: Context menu entry to reset all image transformations.

openOptions.description: Context menu entry to open Rotate and Image Zoom options.
